title: Alquiler de casa o chalet independiente en Santa Ponça
description:
Located in the exclusive area of Nova Santa Ponsa, this stunning villa is available for rent on a generous plot of 1,156 m². The property boasts 566 m² of constructed living space, complemented by spacious outdoor terraces, a private solarium with swimming pool, ample parking, and a large double garage with capacity for up to four vehicles, plus additional exterior parking space.

The home is distributed over two floors. On the main level, you are welcomed by a practical and well-organized entrance area that leads to a bright and spacious living-dining room with direct access to the outdoor areas. The property features a large, fully equipped kitchen with high-end appliances, as well as a 13 m² office space ideal for working from home. This level includes four bedrooms, one of which offers a walk-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom, ensuring both comfort and privacy. The main floor benefits from underfloor heating and centralized air conditioning throughout for year-round climate control.

The lower level features a completely independent living space, perfect for guests or as an entertainment area. Fully furnished and equipped, it includes a private bar, cinema room, gym, billiards table, ping pong, and darts — making it ideal for leisure and relaxation. This level also offers three bedrooms, including one with an en-suite bathroom, two additional full bathrooms, a modern kitchen, and a spacious living-dining area. Heating on this floor is powered by fuel, maintaining a warm and cozy atmosphere.

High-quality finishes are found throughout the villa, with parquet flooring, tiles, and microcement creating a stylish and functional aesthetic. The windows are aluminium with double glazing, offering excellent thermal and acoustic insulation.

This exceptional villa presents a unique opportunity to enjoy luxury living in one of the most sought-after areas of southwest Mallorca, just minutes from Port Adriano marina, golf courses, and all essential amenities.
